name: TagZ
tagline: A command line tool for Linux that can add tags, description to a file and then perform a full text search to search for files.
body:
TagZ
======

A command line tool for Linux that can add tags, description to a file and 
allows you to perform a full text search on those tags.

See the wiki for future goals. ;)

Requirements
==============

1. Python
2. ElasticSearch 
3. python-elasticsearch-client
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
